paramDescriptions.label: Sync Properties
paramDescriptions.description: Array of { path, strategy, rate, source }. Strategy: "interpolate", "snap", or "predict".

paramDescriptions.label: Ownership
paramDescriptions.description: "local" = this client sends, "remote" = receives, "authority" = server decides.

paramDescriptions.label: Interpolation Speed
paramDescriptions.description: Default lerp factor for interpolate strategy.
